column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Ordered a Filet (they ran out of bone in WTF!!)
column3: & mashed potatoes. The food was cooked perfectly. The drinks were ok. Our waitress was really nice. I'd love to go back
column4: but they need to figure out how to accomodate larger parties. Lost a star 4 that because they were unconcerned w/accommodations for my group.
